00012     G4VTrajectory* TrackMap::findTrajectory(G4int trackID) {
00013         G4int currTrackID = trackID;
00014         G4VTrajectory* traj = nullptr;
00015         for (;;) {
00016             traj = trajectoryMap_[currTrackID];
00017             if (traj) {
00018                 break;
00019             } else {
00020                 if (trackIDMap_.find(currTrackID) != trackIDMap_.end()) {
00021                     currTrackID = trackIDMap_[currTrackID];
00022                 } else {
00023                     break;
00024                 }
00025             }
00026         }
00027         return traj;
00028     }
00029 
00030     void TrackMap::clear() {
00031         trackIDMap_.clear();
00032         trajectoryMap_.clear();
00033     }
00034 }
